app.name: Loadiine GX2
app.long_description:
Loads games from SD card.
Yardape8000 : This is a fork of @masqchips fork. Fixed DLC for multiple content such as Wii Sports Club. Removed No Legitimate DLC. Now there is just a "DLC on SD" Turn it on to use a backup of your DLC located on the SD card. Turn it off to use regular DLC.
